name: monorepo
description: Monoweb is the next-generation web application for Online. This is the monorepo source.
author: Dotkom <dotkom@online.ntnu> (https://online.ntnu.no)

scripts.build: pnpm -rc -F @dotkomonline/web -F @dotkomonline/dashboard -F @dotkomonline/rpc -F @dotkomonline/invoicification -F @dotkomonline/rif exec doppler run -- pnpm run build --cache-dir=.turbo
scripts.build:web: pnpm -rc -F @dotkomonline/web exec doppler run -- pnpm run build --cache-dir=.turbo
scripts.build:dashboard: pnpm -rc -F @dotkomonline/dashboard exec doppler run -- pnpm run build --cache-dir=.turbo
scripts.build:brevduen: pnpm -rc -F @dotkomonline/brevduen exec doppler run -- pnpm run build --cache-dir=.turbo
scripts.build:rif: pnpm -rc -F @dotkomonline/rif exec doppler run -- pnpm run build --cache-dir=.turbo
scripts.build:invoicification: pnpm -rc -F @dotkomonline/invoicification exec doppler run -- pnpm run build --cache-dir=.turbo
scripts.dev: pnpm -rc -F @dotkomonline/web -F @dotkomonline/dashboard -F @dotkomonline/rpc -F @dotkomonline/invoicification -F @dotkomonline/rif exec doppler run -- pnpm run dev
scripts.migrate: pnpm -rc -F @dotkononline/migrator exec doppler run -- turbo run migrate && cd packages/db && pnpm generate-types
scripts.migrate-down: pnpm -rc -F @dotkononline/migrator exec doppler run -- turbo run migrate -- down && cd packages/db && pnpm generate-types
scripts.migrate-down-all: pnpm -rc -F @dotkononline/migrator exec doppler run -- turbo run migrate -- down-all && cd packages/db && pnpm generate-types
scripts.migrate-dev: pnpm -rc -F @dotkononline/migrator exec doppler run -- turbo run migrate -- latest --with-seed && cd packages/db && pnpm generate-types
scripts.migrate-with-fixtures: pnpm -rc -F @dotkononline/migrator exec doppler run -- turbo run migrate -- latest --with-fixtures && cd packages/db && pnpm generate-types
scripts.migrate-with-sample-data: pnpm -rc -F @dotkononline/migrator exec doppler run -- turbo run migrate -- latest --sample-data && cd packages/db && pnpm generate-types
scripts.docker:login: aws ecr get-login-password --region eu-north-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 891459268445.dkr.ecr.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com
scripts.docker:login:public: aws ecr-public get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin public.ecr.aws
